featured_section.header_content:
A digital
solution for supporting children with autism.

faq_section.title: About
faq_section.description: EvaluAction is a digital platform designed to support children with autism in their development journey through an individualized and interactive approach. It offers assessment tools, educational strategies and adapted activities to meet the specific needs of each child.

item1.question: What is the EvaluAction platform?
item1.answer: The EvaluAction platform is an interactive digital solution that helps children with autism progress in their development. It offers skills assessments, personalized activities and educational strategies adapted to each child's needs.

item2.question: How does it work?
item2.answer: The platform works through children's skills assessment tools, interactive activities, and real-time progress tracking. It allows educators and parents to support children with personalized plans.

item3.question: Why use EvaluAction?
item3.answer: EvaluAction is designed to offer a unique and interactive experience, allowing children with autism to progress at their own pace. The platform adapts to each child's specific needs and supports educators and parents with modern and easy-to-use tools.

stress_management.description: Techniques for managing and reducing stress

personal_growth.description: Developing a better understanding of oneself and one's abilities

emotion_management.description: Strategies to understand and manage emotions

emotional_intelligence.description: Developing awareness and management of emotions

cognitive_behavioral_therapy.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy

play_therapy.title: Play Therapy
play_therapy.description: Using play in the therapeutic process

timeline_section.title: How it works in the educational framework

explore_themes.title: Explore Educational Themes
explore_themes.description: Browse a wide range of educational themes to better understand the needs of children, parents and professionals. Discover information on psychological development, behavioral strategies and emotional wellbeing.

track_progress.title: Track and Record Progress
track_progress.description: Track the child's emotional and cognitive progress. Record the evolution and get information on behavioral changes through continuous monitoring.

learn_strategies.title: Learn and Practice Strategies
learn_strategies.description: Read and learn from educational resources that provide practical strategies to support children with emotional and developmental needs. Benefit from personalized advice based on real-time assessments.

timeline_section.more_info: Would you like to know more?

evaluation.title: Accurate and personalized assessment
evaluation.description: Detailed monitoring based on recognized education criteria.

interactive_activities.title: Interactive and fun activities
interactive_activities.description: Engaging exercises to stimulate learning and social skills development.

support.title: Support for parents and professionals
support.description: A dedicated space to track progress and adapt interventions.

accessibility.title: Accessibility and ergonomics
accessibility.description: An intuitive interface designed for easy use by children and their caregivers.

evaluation_featured_section.header_content:
Assessment
is a key step in the educational support of children with autism. It helps understand their needs and skills to develop personalized plans.

strengths_and_weaknesses.title: Identify the child's strengths and weaknesses
strengths_and_weaknesses.description: Determine current skills in key areas such as communication, social interactions, motor skills, and adaptive behaviors.

specific_needs.title: Detect specific needs
specific_needs.description: Identify obstacles that limit the child's autonomy and development.

baseline.title: Establish a baseline
baseline.description: Provide accurate data that will be used to measure progress over time.

psychoeducatif.title: EvaluAction
psychoeducatif.description:
Accessibility: Allows use by parents and professionals, without the need for specialized equipment.
Personalization: Tools adapt to each child's specific needs.
Efficiency: Time savings in data collection and analysis.
Continuous monitoring: Regular updates of assessments to adjust support strategies.

child_profile.title: Child profile creation
child_profile.description:
General information (name, age, diagnosis, etc.).
Selection of areas to assess according to specific needs.

interactive_tests.title: Interactive tests and questionnaires
interactive_tests.description:
Series of questions adapted to age and development level.
Fun activities to assess cognitive and social abilities.

real_time_observation.title: Real-time observation and monitoring
real_time_observation.description: Allow parents and professionals to record daily behavioral observations directly in the application.

detailed_report.title: Automatically generated detailed report
detailed_report.description:
Analysis of results in the form of graphs and tables.
Personalized recommendations based on results.

new_featured_section.header_content: For optimal support of children with autism, together!

why_application.title: Why this application?
why_application.description: We designed this application with a clear vision: to offer children with autism, their families, and professionals modern and personalized tools for optimal educational care.

facilitate_evaluation.title: Facilitate needs assessment
facilitate_evaluation.description: Identify children's cognitive, social and behavioral abilities through modern tools.

personalized_support.title: Strengthen personalized support
personalized_support.description: Receive educational recommendations adapted to each child's unique needs, based on assessment results.

family_involvement.title: Promote family involvement
family_involvement.description: Encourage parents to play an active role in assessing and tracking their child's progress.

improve_collaboration.title: Improve collaboration
improve_collaboration.description: Facilitate exchanges between professionals and parents for optimal coordination in care.

fully_adapted.title: 100% adapted
fully_adapted.description: Designed specifically to meet the unique needs of children with autism.

expert_collaboration.title: Created with experts
expert_collaboration.description: Developed in collaboration with professionals and families for optimal effectiveness.

accessible_everywhere.title: Accessible everywhere
accessible_everywhere.description: Usable at any time, wherever you are, thanks to its intuitive platform.

strategies_featured_section.header_content: Discover our approaches to support children with autism towards greater autonomy.

interactive_tools.title: Use of interactive tools
interactive_tools.description: Develop games and fun activities to stimulate cognitive, social and behavioral skills.
interactive_tools.description_en: Develop games and fun activities to stimulate cognitive, social and behavioral skills.

personalized_approach.title: Personalized approach
personalized_approach.description: Adapt educational strategies to each child's specific needs for optimal results.
personalized_approach.description_en: Adapt educational strategies to each child's specific needs for optimal results.

family_involvement.title: Family involvement
family_involvement.description: Create a collaborative environment where parents actively participate in their child's development.
family_involvement.description_en: Create a collaborative environment where parents actively participate in their child's development.

progress_tracking.title: Continuous progress tracking
progress_tracking.description: Provide tools to measure skills evolution and adjust goals accordingly.
progress_tracking.description_en: Provide tools to measure skills evolution and adjust goals accordingly.

has_recommendations.title: HAS recommendations for autism
has_recommendations.description: Application of the French National Authority for Health (HAS) recommendations for evidence-based care adapted to the specific needs of each autistic child.
has_recommendations.description_en: Application of the French National Authority for Health (HAS) recommendations for evidence-based care adapted to the specific needs of each autistic child.

signup_form.terms_content:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By using this service, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions of use.

2. Use of Service

You agree to use this service in a lawful, appropriate manner and in compliance with applicable laws.

3. Privacy and Data Protection

Your personal data will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy. We are committed to protecting your information.

4. Intellectual Property

All content, texts, images, and features of this service are protected by copyright and intellectual property rights.

5. Limitation of Liability

We will not be liable for indirect damages, data loss, or harm resulting from the use of this service.

statistics.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: This card displays the total number of skill categories in your child's profile. Categories group related skills together, making it easier to organize and track progress across different areas of development.

domains.title: Domains
domains.description: This card shows the total number of domains within all categories. Domains represent specific areas of skills within each category, providing a more detailed breakdown of your child's competencies.

items.title: Items
items.description: This card indicates the total number of individual skill items or competencies that have been evaluated. Each item represents a specific skill or ability that is being tracked and assessed.

progress.title: Overall Progress
progress.description: This card displays the overall progress percentage across all evaluated skills. It gives you a quick overview of how much progress your child has made overall, calculated as an average across all domains and categories.

skills_chart.title: Donut Chart - Skills Distribution
skills_chart.description: This circular donut chart displays the distribution of skills by category. Each segment represents a different category, allowing you to quickly visualize how your child's skills are distributed across various areas.

progress_chart.title: Bar Chart - Progress by Category
progress_chart.description: This bar chart shows the progress percentage for each skill category. The bars allow you to easily compare the level of progression between different categories.

line_chart.title: Line Chart - Progress Evolution
line_chart.description: This line chart illustrates the evolution of progress over time. It helps you track trends and identify improvements or areas that need more attention.

polar_chart.title: Polar Chart - Domain Overview
polar_chart.description: This polar area chart provides a visual overview of all skill domains. Each section represents a domain, allowing for quick comparison of their relative importance.

progress_overview.title: Progress Overview by Category
progress_overview.description: This section displays a detailed view of progress for each category. You can see the progress percentage, number of evaluated competencies, and compare with the set goal for each category.

recent_activity.title: Recent Activity
recent_activity.description: This section shows the latest evaluation activities by category. It displays which categories have been recently updated and the number of competencies evaluated, helping you track recent development activity.

welcome.title: User Guide
welcome.description: Welcome to the dashboard. This section will help you understand how to use the different features.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: View your child's skills organized by categories and domains. You can see the progress of each domain.

goals.title: Goals
goals.description: Create and manage goals to track your child's development.

strategies.title: Strategies
strategies.description: Access and manage educational strategies and interventions tailored to your child's needs.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Keep track of important observations, notes, and reminders about your child's progress and activities.

competance.title: Competencies
competance.description: Learn how to view and understand your child's competencies organized by categories and domains.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Visualize statistics and overall progress through different charts and indicators.

change_profile.title: Change Profile / Logout
change_profile.description: Learn how to change profile or logout from your account.

upload_file.title: Upload and Download Files
upload_file.description: Learn how to upload and download files in the application.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Learn how to see all items in domains within a category by expanding them, then how to filter and export the summary.

competance.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Categories group related competencies in different areas of development. Each category contains multiple specific competency domains.

domains.title: Domains
domains.description: Domains represent specific competency areas within each category. Each domain displays its progress percentage and evaluation details.

progress.title: Progress Bar
progress.description: The visual progress bar shows the percentage of competencies acquired for each domain. It allows you to quickly track your child's progress.

dates.title: Tracking Dates
dates.description: Each domain displays the start date and last update date, allowing you to track the history of evaluations and progress.

notes.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

add.title: Add a Note
add.description: This video shows you how to add a new note to track important observations about your child's progress and activities. You can create notes with titles, descriptions, and dates to organize your observations.

edit.title: Edit a Note
edit.description: Learn how to edit an existing note to update information, correct errors, or add additional details. You can modify the title, description, and other details of your notes.

delete.title: Delete a Note
delete.description: Discover how to delete a note you no longer need. Deletion is permanent, so make sure you want to remove the note before confirming the action.

filter.title: Filter Notes
filter.description: This video explains how to use filters to quickly find specific notes. You can filter by date, title, or other criteria to organize and locate your notes more easily.

objectifs.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

add.title: Add an Objective
add.description: This video shows you how to add a new objective to track your child's development. You can create objectives with titles, descriptions, target dates, and other details to organize your development goals.

edit.title: Edit an Objective
edit.description: Learn how to edit an existing objective to update information, correct errors, or add additional details. You can modify the title, description, dates, and other details of your objectives.
edit.remark: Note: If you choose "Don't update" when editing, the objective will be disabled until reactivated through editing.

delete.title: Delete an Objective
delete.description: Discover how to delete an objective you no longer need. Deletion is permanent, so make sure you want to remove the objective before confirming the action.

passer_quiz.title: Take a Quiz
passer_quiz.description: This video explains how to take a quiz to evaluate your child's progress towards an objective. Quizzes allow you to track and assess performance in a structured way.
passer_quiz.date_remark: Important Note: The "Take Quiz" function is only accessible when the date is today. You can only take the quiz on the scheduled day.
passer_quiz.quiz_remark: Note: If you choose "Don't update" in the quiz popup, the objective will be disabled until reactivated through editing.

strategies.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

remark.title: Important Note
remark.text: Nothing will show in the list of strategies until you answer an evaluation about the kids with partial answer items.

overview.title: Strategies Overview
overview.description: This video gives you an overview of the strategies section. You'll learn how to navigate the list of strategies and understand how they are organized and displayed.

filter_export.title: Filter and Export Strategies
filter_export.description_title: How to Filter and Export Strategies
filter_export.description: This video shows you how to filter strategies using the state of items, then how to export the filtered results to PDF or Excel format. You can organize your strategies according to different criteria and export them for offline use or sharing.

change_profile.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

change_profile.title: Change profile or logout
change_profile.description_title: How to change profile or logout
change_profile.description: This video shows you how to change profile to access another child's profile, or how to logout from your account. You can easily switch between different profiles or logout securely.

upload_file.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

upload_download.title: Upload and Download Files
upload_download.description_title: How to Upload and Download Files
upload_download.description: This video demonstrates how to upload files to the application and download files from it. Learn the step-by-step process for managing files, including selecting files, uploading them, and downloading documents when needed.

summary.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

remark.title: Important Note
remark.text: The summary will show the last result changes in the selected time period.

expand_items.title: Expand Items in Summary
expand_items.description_title: How to See All Items in Domains Within a Category
expand_items.description: This video shows you how to expand a category to see all items in the domains. You'll learn how to use the expand function to display all details of evaluated items in each domain of a specific category.

filter_export.title: Filter and Export Summary
filter_export.description_title: How to Filter and Export Summary
filter_export.description: This video shows you how to filter the summary according to different criteria (time period, categories, domains) and how to export the filtered results to PDF or Excel format. The summary will show the last result changes in the selected time period.
